message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/GESIS2010 

For a collaborative research project in the area of Social Web, Linked Open Data and E-Government the GESIS - Leibniz-Institute for Social Sciences opens a position for 1 Research Associate (75% TV-L EG 13) at the location Bonn/Cologne.
There is the possibility to pursue a PhD. The contract will first be limited to 2 years.
Your job will be ...
- Conceptual design of scenarios for a Web3.0-eGovernance project
- Toolbox development for interaction of policy makers and users on social networking platforms
- Evaluation of toolbox with end-users
- Development of methodology to use the toolbox
We expect from you ...
- MS degree in Computer Science or related field
- Skills in the area of Semantic Web and Web 3.0
- Skills in software development (particular in SOA) 
- Conceptual thinking ability
- Cooperative teamwork
speaker: SYSTEM
